title.native: 声優ラジオのウラオモテ
title.english: The Many Sides of Voice Actor Radio

description:
Yuuhi Yugure and Yasumi Utatane, high school classmates and co-hosts of a weekly radio program, paint a picture-perfect friendship for their listeners. Yet, in reality, they couldn’t be more different. Their off-air dynamic is a whirlwind of chaos and insults. As their tumultuous relationship unfolds, they navigate the turbulent waters of friendship and rivalry in the cutthroat realm of showbiz.

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Super Robot
tags.description: Prominently features large robots often piloted by hot-blooded protagonists.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

title.native: 声優ラジオのウラオモテ
声優ラジオのウラオモテ

node.description: He is a member of Writers Guild of Japan.

[Profile (Style Cube)](http://stylecube.jp/talents/miku/index.html) | [Profile (Columbia)](https://columbia.jp/itomiku/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/itou-miku/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/InfoItomiku) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/itomiku_official/) | [LINE](https://page.line.me/itomiku_official) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miku_Itō) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/伊藤美来)

Miku joined the idol unit [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177) on April 27, 2013 and is one half of its subunit, [Pyxis](https://anilist.co/staff/139753), along with [Moe Toyota](https://anilist.co/staff/118398). 

Miku's hobbies include watching anime, dancing, and playing Hyakunin Isshu. She also practices kendo (but is at the lowest level) and enjoys acting. She is a fan of Kamen Rider, and her favorite rider is Den-O.

**Non-anime roles:**
• Fu Xuan - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
• Olivia - Memento Mori (VG)
• Kolulu - Granblue Fantasy (VG)
• Indomitable - Azur Lane (VG)
• Liv - Punishing: Gray Raven (VG)
• Agnès Claudel - Kiseki Series (VG)

[Profile (MONACA)](http://www.monaca.jp/staff/takahashi.html)

Japanese composer and arranger working for music production company MONACA since 2013. He is a graduate of Hokkaido University of Education.

__[Artist Profile (MONACA)](http://www.monaca.jp/staff/hirokawa.html)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kayone87)__

__Keiichi Hirokawa__ is a Japanese music composer and arranger who belongs to sound production studio MONACA.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/toyotamoe) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/toyotamoe/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/toyotamoe/) | [Agency Profile](http://stylecube.jp/talents/moe/index.html)

She is one of the new members of [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177) that joined on April 27, 2013 and is one half of its subunit, [Pyxis](https://anilist.co/staff/139753), along with [Miku Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118581/Miku-Itou).
